tasks.context:
Create a rate limiting documentation page. File: frontend/app/docs/rate-limiting/page.tsx

This is a Next.js server component (NO 'use client'). Documents how the SDK handles rate limiting.

Structure:
- h1: 'Rate Limiting'
- p: Brief intro about API rate limits and how the SDK handles them automatically
- h2: 'How It Works' — p explaining the SDK reads x-ratelimit-limit, x-ratelimit-remaining, x-ratelimit-reset headers from every response
- h2: 'Automatic Retry' — p explaining the SDK automatically waits and retries when rate limited (429 status). Code block: const invoices = await client.listInvoices(); // SDK waits if rate limited
- h2: 'Manual Rate Limit Checking' — code block showing: import { RateLimitTracker } from '@invoica/sdk'; const tracker = new RateLimitTracker(); tracker.update(responseHeaders); if (tracker.shouldWait()) { await tracker.waitIfNeeded(); }
- h2: 'Default Limits' — ul with 3 items: 100 requests per minute per API key, 1000 requests per hour per API key, Rate limit headers included in every response

Use ONLY inline styles. No Tailwind. No external imports. No 'use client'. Style: maxWidth 768px, margin '0 auto', padding 32px, fontFamily system-ui. h1 fontSize 32px, h2 fontSize 24px marginTop 32px. Code blocks: backgroundColor '#f5f5f5', padding 16px, borderRadius 8px, overflowX 'auto', fontFamily monospace.

Maximum 55 lines. Export default function RateLimitingPage().

tasks.context:
Create a retry configuration documentation page. File: frontend/app/docs/retry/page.tsx

This is a Next.js server component (NO 'use client'). Documents the SDK retry behavior.

Structure:
- h1: 'Retry Configuration'
- p: Brief intro about automatic retry with exponential backoff for transient errors
- h2: 'Retryable Status Codes' — ul listing: 408 Request Timeout, 429 Too Many Requests, 500 Internal Server Error, 502 Bad Gateway, 503 Service Unavailable, 504 Gateway Timeout
- h2: 'Configuration' — code block: const client = new CountableClient({ apiKey: 'inv_live_...', maxRetries: 5, timeout: 30000 });
- h2: 'Backoff Strategy' — p explaining exponential backoff with jitter. Formula: delay = min(baseDelay * 2^attempt + random_jitter, maxDelay)
- h2: 'Disabling Retries' — code block: const client = new CountableClient({ apiKey: 'inv_live_...', maxRetries: 0 });

Use ONLY inline styles. No Tailwind. No external imports. No 'use client'. Style: maxWidth 768px, margin '0 auto', padding 32px, fontFamily system-ui. h1 fontSize 32px, h2 fontSize 24px marginTop 32px. Code blocks: backgroundColor '#f5f5f5', padding 16px, borderRadius 8px, overflowX 'auto', fontFamily monospace.

Maximum 55 lines. Export default function RetryPage().
